thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Louise

author: Louise
title: Louise
text:
We stayed with Edenia for three nights and it felt like home. Edenia, her lovely mother and family did everything to make us feel welcome to their home. Helped us with tours, taxi collectivos and even arranged a private salsa lesson on the house's front porch.
The room was comfortable, nice and clean, breakfast delicious and the nights we had dinner in the casa, the food was delicious, abundant and very typical Cuban.
The neighbourhood felt safe and located just a few blocks from central Vinales.
We highly recommend you to stay with Edenia!
